com.gensym.message
Class Resource

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.gensym.message.Resource
public class Resource
extends Object
implements Serializable

A helper class that aids in the debugging of resource providing and assists in making resource usage simpler. It is a wrapper around java.util.ResourceBundle.

Debugging: After Resource.setResourceDebug(true) is called, when a resource is not found, rather than throwing an exception, the various format and getString methods return the key and print an error message to standard out.

Convenience: the various format methods take both the message lookup key, and the arguments that should be used to substitute into the variable parts of the found string. For this it uses java.text.MessageFormat.

Additional Functionality: This class is Serializable, and it achieves this by looking up the associated ResourceBundle during the readObject() method.

See Also:
ResourceBundle, MessageFormat, Serialized Form

setResourceDebug

public static void setResourceDebug(boolean on)
Controls exception throwing of getString().
Parameters:
on - If on is true, then instead of throwing an exception, getString() will print a log message.
